cofh.lib.fluid

Class FluidStorageAdjustable

  • java.lang.Object
    • cofh.lib.fluid.FluidStorageCoFH
      • cofh.lib.fluid.FluidStorageAdjustable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFluidStackAccess, IResourceStorage, net.minecraftforge.fluids.capability.IFluidHandler

    public class FluidStorageAdjustable
extends FluidStorageCoFH
    Implementation of a Fluid Storage object. Does NOT implement IFluidTank. Additional options (fill/drain limits) are provided.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface net.minecraftforge.fluids.capability.IFluidHandler
